title: Headhunter Akali???
body: So on the patch notes round up on NewsOfLegends it said Headhunter Akali would be available right when patch 5.5 was out and she still isnt available so i'm wondering if anybody knows when it will be i really wanna buy it {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We generally release skins throughout the patch, not just as soon as the patch goes live.
i know that but any idea what date it will be released?
Unfortunately, we don't announce when a skin is released, just because of the off chance that we would have to delay it by a day or two. Sorry!
Will there be a discount once it is released? {{summoner:31}}
Yup! 1350 RP skins are always 975 RP at launch!
Thank you for replying and helping me get closure! Nice to know Riot cares

I want this skin so bad. at least you guys are responding about it. lol it gives me hopes that its close ..i respect your decision not to release skin dates. I'll be waiting.

{{champion:84}}
I say it's at least by Tuesday, since Wensday should be the next patch.
